## createAvatarIK() function

Create [AvatarIK](./three-avatar.avatarik.md)<!-- -->. (Experimental Features)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createAvatarIK(avatar: Avatar, handGetter: VRHandGetter, option?: CreateAvatarIKOptions): AvatarIK;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  avatar | [Avatar](./three-avatar.avatar.md) |  |
|  handGetter | [VRHandGetter](./three-avatar.vrhandgetter.md) | Get XR controller objects. |
|  option | [CreateAvatarIKOptions](./three-avatar.createavatarikoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[AvatarIK](./three-avatar.avatarik.md)

## Example


```ts

...

onVR: async () => {
  await avatar.setIKMode(true);
  avatarIK = createAvatarIK(
    avatar,
    {
      left: () => leftXRController,
      right: () => rightXRController,
    },
  );
},
onNonVR: async () => {
  await avatar.setIKMode(false);
  avatarIK?.dispose();
}

...


const clock = new THREE.Clock();
renderer.setAnimationLoop(() => {
  ...
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  avatar.tick(dt);
  avatarIK?.tick(dt);
});
```
